name: Micro Edge Skill Development Society
briefDescription: We TRUST people. Everyone in the organisation works for a common cause and is equally dedicated and honest for Micro Edge Computer Academy. If we cannot TRUST someone, the situation demands action. We cannot live with MISTRUST    We RESPECT each other. Irrespective of where a Micro Edge Computer Academy team member is within the hierarchy or geography, RESPECT is paramount. If we cannot respect someone, the situation demands intervention of HR. We will have ZERO tolerance towards DISRESPECT.    Every individual in the organisation is ACCOUNTABLE towards his or her core responsibility. Accountability is non- negotiable. A team member is accountable - towards Self ; for discipline, efficiency, costs, trust, respect accountability and m
